title: The Stickit minister's wooing,
author: Crockett, S. R.
snippet: " And this I was very content to do, delivering Rachel into the hands of her uncle, Lancelot Pringle of Quarrelwood,  in due time — but a longer time mayhap than in ordinary circumstances it takes to traverse the distance between the fords of Holywood over against Netherholm and the mansion house of Quarrelwood.
